title: 102 Things to Do in Autumn
description: Autumn.The trees are shedding their leaves to carpet the ground in a glorious collage of colour. Clouds, tinted a mellow orange, race across the sky. Starlings gather in great flocks called 'murmurations' and swoop over the landscape in breathtaking synchrony . . .Nature is at its best in autumn -- and so can you be, with the help of this inspiring book full of creative and surprising ideas.
author: Alex Quick
